name: stark marketing
tag_list: web-design, seo, internet-marketing, web-development, branding, logos, marketing
overview:
stark marketing offers web design, web development, SEO, graphics design, and branding for small to medium sized businesses.

web design - with our unique approach, we implement visual cues alongside marketing principles with every project. We are an ROI driven web company that considers all aspects of customer interaction, usability, design and converting visitors into customers.

web development - any consideration to functionality of a website is critical. You don’t need to hire multiple companies to get your site up and running correctly. We can handle your nuts and bolts functionality whether it’s e-commerce, management, portals, or any other database driven solution.

SEO - every site is hand coded and we offer the details of optimization in our packages. we also offer off-site SEO that builds your search engine ranking over time.

Graphics Design - this is easy for us because we work so hard at web design. Any print design is second nature because of its simplicity and the fact that print is static whereas web is dynamic. We also design banner ads and magazine/newspaper ads. Our unique 4E formula for advertising and design sets your ad head and shoulders above your competition.

Branding - We can help you define your brand, from the logo, to the color scheme and usages. Corporate Identity Kits are available in our packages as well as guideline documentation.
